title: Dinnerbone: Mojang将于本周五更新官方反混淆表所使用的协议
author: Neubulaeko
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Neubulaeko 于 2020-8-13 02:59 编辑 

图片指向推特原文，请自备七根木棍


Heads up Minecraft modders: On Friday we'll change the legal text on our obfuscation mappings. We're hoping that this change will make the legal terms clearer for projects like MCP/Forge/Spigot/etc to operate going forwards, ideally using our maps, and make modding easier for all.

诸位mod制作者注意啦！本周五，我们将更改我们的反混淆表所使用的法律文本。我们希望本次更改将会让法律条款更为明晰，以供诸如MCP/Forge/Spigot等项目进行发展——更理想一点就是用上我们的表啦——且让mod制作更为简便易行。

We would like to see projects start to switch to the official Mojang names, to help bring the entire modding community together and help with compatibility.

The new legal text can be previewed here: https://gist.githubusercontent.c ... 5f61e/gistfile1.txt

我们希望看到各个项目逐渐迁移到Mojang的，官方提供的反混淆名，以此来团结我们的mod社区，并为兼容性添砖加瓦。

新的法律文本可于此处预览：https://gist.githubusercontent.c ... 5f61e/gistfile1.txt

Existing mappings will still be available under the old terms, but we will also republish them with the new terms on Friday. All new mappings provided in the future will be under the new terms.

If you have any questions, concerns or comments then please come to me!

已有的反混淆表仍保留以旧有协议发布的版本，但于周五我们会重新将它们以新协议发布。日后发布的所有混淆表也将统一采用新的法律条款。

若有疑虑或评论，欢迎向我（Dinnerbone）留言！




以下是新法律文本，附中文翻译（本人渣翻，不具备法律效益，一切以原文为准）：

© 2020 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved. These mappings are provided "as-is" and you bear the risk of using them. You may copy and use the mappings for development purposes, but you may not redistribute the mappings complete and unmodified. Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the mappings provided here.  Use and modification of source code for Minecraft: Java Edition is governed by the Minecraft End User License Agreement available at https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula. 

© 2020 Microsoft Corporation. 保留所有权利。本反混淆表发布内容“如是”，使用者自行承担所有后果。你可以出于开发目的对本反混淆表进行复制与使用，但你不能够完整且不做更改地重新分发本反混淆表。微软对本处发布的反混淆表不声明或暗示任何担保。对Minecraft: Java版的源代码的使用与更改受Minecraft的最终用户许可协议（于https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula）监管。

replies.txt_content: （MOJANG对MCP等处于灰色地带的逆向工程的一大表态）
